website_summaries.verdict: This is the classic boot model from Timberland — great choice that will never go out of style.
pros: We love the supportive gel insoles and solid stitching between the upper and rubber sole
Improved design has no seam in heel
Waterproof with an imported rubber sole
Nubuck leather resists moisture for a long time, while the padded collar adds comfort
cons: Fit may be larger than expected
More of a fashion boot than a rugged work boot

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE FAKE
customer_reviews.text: These are fake and I knew it the second I opened the box. 1st of all it didn't come in a timberland box. 2 there's plastic on the lace tip, timberland doesn't do that. 3 these are as orange as a traffic cone come on man. 4 there's white streaks all over the sole. 5 the timberland logo on the bottom is crooked. There's more but I'm sick of typing. Pass on this people
customer_reviews.author: Jay G III

customer_reviews.title: These aren't Timberlands.
customer_reviews.text: These aren't Timberlands. The only Timberland logos, except on the sole, are cheap metal, glued or laced on. Quality is far below Timberlands standards.
customer_reviews.author: Blest&Gr8ful

customer_reviews.title: NOT LEATHER, NOT AS DESCRIBED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT RECOMMEND!!! These were advertised as "leather" and they feel like rubber. If you scratch them, they make a sound like scratching on a rubbery surface. 100% not leather! Also, the toe part of the shoe is completely discolored and faded white. They were listed as navy. No mention of a completely discolored toe. They actually look and feel like cheap clown shoes. Do yourself a favor and avoid!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Made in China. Did not fit right. Returned ...
customer_reviews.text: Made in China . Did not fit right . Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic pain in my feet and legs. It is very difficult to find shoes that don't hurt my feet. However, these boots are more comfortable than any other pair of shoes/boots I own. I wore them on a 3-hour shopping spree with my wife. Not once did I experience pain or discomfort. The boots are awesome. They look good and they feel good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: LEGIT TIMBS!
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie I was skeptical when I purchased these, the price was too good to be true (they are $200 at the mall) and I was fully expecting to return them. My Amazon return box is a mile away so I bit the bullet and gave it a shot. These are authentic and the real deal color was very dark and not washed out and no scratches to be found. I will be buying more pairs for sure
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: For this price I am completely shocked my husband takes care of his wardrobe and after wearing these boots three times we immediately noticed discoloration after wiping them with a towel and this was water only...SHOCKED!
customer_reviews.author: Iishea Crayton

customer_reviews.title: Consider Going with  Timberland Men's Earthkeepers Rugged Boot
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Timberland Men's Earthkeepers Rugged Boot. I purchased this oe because I ride a motorcycle and my first Timberlands were always getting scuffed by the gear shifter and foot pegs. The textured surface defintiley does retard scuffing and seems durable, but the fit is nt as good and the support, compared to the Timberland Men's Earthkeepers Rugged Boot -- is lacking. Considering these cost more I'd go with Timberland Men's Earthkeepers Rugged Boot
customer_reviews.author: Piercepro2001

customer_reviews.title: Unusual fit
customer_reviews.text: They do look like legit Timberlands, I went to the actual store to compare them. But this specific model’s fit is very weird. They are just too wide. I have tried them on with extra thick socks, but they are just too big. My usual size 10 feels like 10.5 at least.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Boots degrade quickly and description lies
customer_reviews.text: The description lies. The boots are not waterproof and have not been treated. Two months of light wear and they have already degraded signifantly. Don’t buy these. I’m so dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roberts

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them
customer_reviews.text: This was the only thing my teen-aged son wanted for his birthday. This is the waterproof version with a padded collar. It does not have steel toes. I treated the nubuck leather with a non-silicone spray to protect it against staining. We chose the classic wheat color. He hasn't had any trouble breaking them in--no blisters, not too stiff to walk in. He had an outdoor lab in his Field Biology class the day after he got them, and they performed great. (They aren't rubber Wellies, though; don't expect to be able to stand in ankle-deep water for a long time.)
customer_reviews.author: Book Collector

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for cold
customer_reviews.text: High quality boot. True to size. It is also water repellant which makes it easier to clean and extends its life. Great boot for cold, wet months!💦
customer_reviews.author: Oxana

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots, Happy Son
customer_reviews.text: My son goes to college at University of Maine where there is SNOW, and previously he, would NOT wear boots, until this year. He asked for these boots specifically. I did my homework, and got the waterproof Timberlands. I also purchased a size smaller than his usual 12, because other reviews of the boot, said that they run a size bigger. My son says the boots fit and he is very pleased. I love Amazon. I was able to shop, right here in my warm home, and have the boots shipped directly to his college. Easy breezy. Done. Happy Mom, happy son, warm feet, warm heart.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Updated, REAL, and non profit review
customer_reviews.text: A lot of reviews over the past year or so have said these were fake. Whatever the issue was has been fixed, as these are the real deal. They have the correct timberland weight, lacing, logo, and sole. The quality of the suede is that of timberland standards, scuff proof and waterproof. You can find peace in knowing you’re not getting a knock off boot anymore. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JB Hammerz

customer_reviews.title: Broken in out of the box !
customer_reviews.text: After many years of hearing people rave about Tims I finally gave in and expected a break in period of a few weeks like my other boots chief amongst being Doc M’s . There were perfectly comfy out of the box and In winter season I couldn’t have been warmer . Would recommend to anyone looking for durable , warm and out of the box deal like no other .
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Best of boots ever
customer_reviews.text: Built to Last and look good at the same time Sturdy, super well made, they are unbelievably durable >i really like running on grass, dirt and harsh terrains. But I hate to see my kicks die in one month or 2.. These will do, and last. I can tell., and they will look as new. Buy a half size smaller as many have said. I personally like half larger fit on boots like these So I ordered 8 when I'm an 8 and like to wear a 8.5
customer_reviews.author: Treeink (Sergio Briseño)

customer_reviews.title: Boots are not comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: The boots are original, but rotated. Or defective: the left boot is perfect, and the right one has a size of 11W, and I ordered 11M (although under the mark -11M). They look different - the right has a warmer shade and the shape of the sock is slightly different than the left one. And the skin in the right is softer than in the left boot. The seller - Shoebay - offered to return the shoes, but I do not live in the US, so I did not have a 30-day deadline. The seller refused to increase the term
customer_reviews.author: Ed.Shevsky

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Boot
customer_reviews.text: I've owned in the past and knew what to expect , so no surprises there, I am currently Working in the Middle East where rainy season is long and my location easily floods, turning everything into a miasma of Mud! Boots are truly waterproof . I also treated them with a coating of waterproofing spray and water just falls away! Leaving them DRY!! Highly Recommend! Although pricey .....well, you get what you Pay for......even though they're no longer American made,,,,,,,,,
customer_reviews.author: Doc Strange

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love them, but...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Timberlands for a long time now, and the only reason I rate them 4/5 is just because the insoles do not have enough arch support and I have to buy extra money. Other than that, these are excellent boots! Gotta love them!
customer_reviews.author: Fausto

customer_reviews.title: Got a defective pair
customer_reviews.text: The Timbs are legit which is cool. They get a 2 star review though because they lost my package which made it late. What really sucks though is that one of the shoes’ tounges came all twisted up. It’s unfixable and makes the shoes look pretty dumpy upon close inspection
customer_reviews.author: scalper22

customer_reviews.title: Come on, its timberland boots
customer_reviews.text: Ay, these timberland boots were something that I was dreaming of for months and after purchasing it, I thought that these shoes are just perfect with its design and practicality. Even though it looks stiff on the outside, it is really comfortable in the inside and it fit as expected so you can wear it for all day. Also, timberland boots can be matched with any sort of clothing so you don't have to go crazy about what to wear in the morning. And you will not feel cold during winter because these boots are thick enough to keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Love this boots, they fit hobbit feet surprisingly well!
customer_reviews.text: Having wide feet makes it hard to find fashionable footwear. These let you have the best of both worlds! Although, like any leather boot, these must be worn in for the most accurate fit. A great way to do so without voiding the return policy (for most online footwear providers) is to walk in these on a treadmill for 20-30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my little brother. He had been searching for these in many stores and an they wouldn’t have his size. I ordered them on a Thursday night and we got them by lunch on Saturday. He love them and they are a perfect fit and product was as described.
customer_reviews.author: KimmyD13

customer_reviews.title: Size runs large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 17, and I wear I size 17 US. The boot slid around my foot, and the laces seemed barely long enough to tie with each eyelet threaded. Reordering for a slightly smaller pair. The insole feels cheap, and the nubuck material on the outside was marred and scuffed in spots, but overall the boot looks great and feels extremely sturdy. Can’t wait to get a proper fitting pair that I can wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Still awesome boots, hope they don’t make a comeback don’t want everyone and their mother walking around in these lol
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about it. I wear 11 nikes, all my boots are 10.5, yet the 10.5 in these were too big. Decided to go w the timberland pro version of these and the 10.5 fits good...little tight actually. They’re almost exactly the same and the pros come w a steel toe, and are$70 less think I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Pete the Roofer

customer_reviews.title: poorly made..
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately..the boots I ordered were poorly made,they are not bootleg but the condition of them was pretty bad. The leather was already scuffed and the glue around the soul was very sketchy,not actually sure how long these will last. I ordered them for work so it didn't bother me to much considering they will get banged up regardless. I have a pair of wheat timberlands I wear for casual that I payed 200 dollars for but they are in great condition. I'd say order these if they are for work and not to impress,if so it's risky.
customer_reviews.author: Jessej

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Timberland fan and actually replacing a boot I already own. I bought these 4-5 years ago and that pair is in good shape; it's just I started wearing them in heavy snow so I wanted to have my next pair lined up and ready! Timberland is one of the only brands that has maintained the same level of quality over the past 20 years so it's always a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are absolutely fake. We got them in the mail yesterday and I thought they were plastic at first. I would not recommend them to anybody and they need to change their damn description to say fake or knockoffs. If I could give this product zero stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great outdoors and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These boots are nice because they are easy to clean. There has never been an instance when I could not use soap and water to get dirt or stains off of it. They always end up looking nice, and they dry fast. Warm enough for New Hampshire winters (with the right socks). The laces come a little short, I usually have to take them out of the top eyelet to undo my boots. I tuck my laces though, so the shortness does make that easier. Does need breaking in. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MacMan

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my husband these for his Bday and I looked at reviews, I went with my gut instinct even after reading some bad reviews. They arrived in prestige condition, no tears & the sole looks great. My husband loved his boots he states that the boot does feel humid when getting wet but other than that it’s an amazing fit and as of now no issues! We are happy with this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claribel Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boots.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely hesitant about purchasing these Tims, because I have had some experiences in the past with orders of online Timberland boots. These were actually very comfortable, and the fit is what I would expect from this brand of boots. I only hope that more colors are going to be made available from this seller I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Migs

customer_reviews.title: Boots are nice but run narrow
customer_reviews.text: Size ran too small. I got charged a $17 restocking fee. I purchase items from Amazon all of the time and have never been charged a fee. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amy H

customer_reviews.title: Expecting greatness
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my husband. He seems to like them. He hasn’t worn them yet. Now that he has worn them the quality just didn’t meet my standard Timberland boot. I wish that I had paid more for them at high end retail store to get the better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyevo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic boot, consider sizing down
customer_reviews.text: Timberlands are a very functional and very fashionable look. I picked mine up in the wheat nubuck and they look great. As many other reviewers have recommended, sizing down might actually be a great choice. I wear all shoes in men 13 and bought the same in tims but they do have a lot of spare room which I don't mind much but something to consider if you do grab a pair. I could have easily slid into a size 12.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I nice upgrade the other ones lasted years and thousands of miles
customer_reviews.text: I nice upgrade the other ones lasted years and thousands of miles Nice upgrade the other ones lasted years and thousands of miles through swamps snow sand fire Chemicals and things just leave it at things the last pair were well made and these seem of the same
customer_reviews.author: Hayward1010

customer_reviews.title: the amazon size suggestion tool recommended I go down to 11
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 12, the amazon size suggestion tool recommended I go down to 11.5, which I am glad I did. I love these boots. They look really nice and they feel really nice. I wouldn't normally spend so much on boots but they're both fashionable and functional. I can wear them for a while to look good and when they're out of style or too dirty they'll make excellent work boots. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Weird Stitch across the arch
customer_reviews.text: There is a weird stitch across the arch support. It makes the boots very uncomfortable. It makes me believe the boots are not genuine Tims.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Wierzba

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Timberlands and I have not been disappointed yet. I bought this to replace one that I have been wearing for almost 9 years. It's still going but it's worn down a lot so I got this one. I have wide feet so I got the wider size and it fit wonderfully. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart after 3 wears
customer_reviews.text: The soles of these shoes are coming off neatly like they weren't made correctly or are not real. The only reason I bought these is because I cant find my husbands shoe size in stores and the only place that had 15 was amazon. Please don't buy it from amazon if you can avoid it. $200 down the drain after only 3 wears! and they were only worn to social occasions. So bummed out!
customer_reviews.author: jessica jasmin prokopets

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Like most people here, I didn't buy these for "work." These boots are iconic, yet functional. They'll last years. They look good, keep my feet surprisingly warm. My only qualm is the opening. I got these in a men's 8c/d, which is roughly a woman's 9.5w, and they're murder to get on, but once on, they're a little bit too big.
customer_reviews.author: Feles MalaTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: My New shoes
customer_reviews.text: About two years ago I decided to stop buying sneakers and I bought a pair of Timberlands and made them my one and only item I would put on my feet. I bought these and I have loved them from the first day I got them. They fit well. The only problem I had is the strings will give out over time But I think I am hard on strings. I just bought some new ones with out a problem. I think it should be time for a new pair very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bstone18

customer_reviews.title: 100% aunthentic
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can say is that they fit almost a half size bigger than expected so if you wear a 9.5 or a size 9 in timbs might wanna get an 8.5... but over all they're everything I expected and at a great price point.... will be gettin a pair of black ones next week.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Order a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a size 14 but after reading the reviews that these boots run large I ordered a size 13 which fit him perfectly. He loves them and wears them all the time to school - not just for when it's snowing.
customer_reviews.author: MamaFields

customer_reviews.title: Classic Tims
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, durable, and authentic. I might need to return for a smaller size though. Much larger than a typical sneaker runs, as you might expect. I usually wear 11.5, but I will need to return these for 11...maybe even 10.5. These Tims aren't for the faint of heart.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Kreiss

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot
customer_reviews.text: I returned , however it was a good boot it wasn’t the right style for the person I brought them for as a gift .
customer_reviews.author: Donna H-S

customer_reviews.title: The boots are perfect, they're totally waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The boots are perfect, they're totally waterproof, I bought this as a Christmas present for my boyfriend unfortunately I had to return the first pair (size 9E Us) because I was scared that they fit very big on him but it doesn't (his normal size is 10) so I change them one size up 10E US and was just right! Very happy with thus purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Estefania hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Bought these as an anniversary gift and they arrived appearing new but had scuffs and stains. For the price of the boots they should be spotless like any timberlands when you first get them. :( very sad amazon
customer_reviews.author: corey fuerderer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the blue. Aren’t leather which is fine by me. Order a size smaller than what you usually wear always with Timberland.
customer_reviews.author: Rider

customer_reviews.title: I get compliments every time I wear these!
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with classic black timbs. I wore them multiple times during the winter and never had issues, and received plenty of compliments whenever I wore them. The only issue I have is that some of the color would rub off onto my ankle, but I expect that'll get better over time.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara F

customer_reviews.title: Great  🥾.  Got em for my daughter for christmas she loves them. 🧡
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter for xmas, only ordered them like 5 days before, they came in 2 days very fast & they fit her perfect!! She was so happy 😃🎁😃 Didnt think i was gonna be able to get them.. Thank u Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart in 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my dad as a Christmas present this year. He is a farmer and generally wears them around the farm. Made it about 6 months before the bottom literally peeled off. Very terrible construction to only last this long.
customer_reviews.author: Shoultz

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Authentic Timberlands
customer_reviews.text: Very nice authentic timberlands purchased from arkbay. half the cost from the timberland website, great deal.
customer_reviews.author: J.r.

customer_reviews.title: These are really comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots. He says they are the most comfortable shoes he’s worn. That says a lot coming from him because he has worn Timberlands forever. It’s a beautiful color green and in certain light it has a gray hint.
customer_reviews.author: The truth

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I paid a lot of money for these and they were not made with good material. I know this because I bought the same pair for my other son at another store at a similar price and his were way better looking and made!! I had to go elsewhere because they didn’t have my other sons size. Wish I waited or returned them!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: love my boots
customer_reviews.text: love my boots, thought I would need inserts because it is very firm to the touch however when I put them on my feet they feel just fine without extra padding
customer_reviews.author: jimmy l lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality!
customer_reviews.text: The leather itself is black nubuck, and looks really elegant, though I suspect it will scuff soon enough. The laces are a little flimsy looking, don't think they will last too long. The boots fit comfortably, seem really sturdy and rugged too. The insides have a little padding, so it does not feel really stiff, though the boot construction itself is quite stiff. The sole is solid and grippy rubber, so expect this to work well in most terrains. The advice always has been to order half a size less than what you normally wear (say order 9.5 if you actually wear a 10), and that works well here.
customer_reviews.author: AV Max

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband who is a timberland aficionado and I can’t complain each time I order from amazon I receive great product ! My husband is very pleased
customer_reviews.author: r.stgo

customer_reviews.title: Deep blue color
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my husband. Loves the deep blue color.
customer_reviews.author: bridget

customer_reviews.title: These are a really nice color and look both professional and are warm and ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a lifelong Tims fan. These are a really nice color and look both professional and are warm and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Original stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. Bought this to replace my 8 year old Tim's and it came identical to my original ones which never got torn Great buy. Don't think twice, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not you typical classic material. LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting the original suede material like all my other timberlands, but these are different. Kind of a rubbery leatherish type style. Either way I LOVE them and they wont mess up with water!
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo Soto

customer_reviews.title: There OK, But It is All About Fashion
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son for Christmas because he just had to have Timberland boots. The purchase was more about fashion than the quality of these boots. Equivalent quality boots can be had for less than half the price of these.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots as a gift for my boyfriend because he had wanted these type of boots for some time. I ordered them and they arrived in time for Christmas! I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Maris likeParis

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible comfort!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots I have had, comfortable, nice looking, waterproof and they seem to be indestructible. This is actually my second pair which is how I can rate them. My first pair was stolen out of my car unfortunately so someone got a great pair of boots!
customer_reviews.author: RO

customer_reviews.title: My Main Boots
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these boots for years now after my right foot toe fusion. The dr. said no more narrow toe boots or shoes. These are great for all conditions, snow, dirt, etc. They clean up pretty easily as they're waterproof. Just don't get any oil on them. I usually go for a year in a pair and then it's time for a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality boot but runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: I got them mostly for the waterproof factor for winter. They were a little large on me. Perhaps a 1/2 inch... but it's not horrible and something I could live with. When I got them I immediately tossed them on and went outside to shovel snow. They maintained their waterproof integrity well while I was stomping around in foot tall mounds of snow. In my old timberland's, my feet would have been soaking we and cold by the time I was done... My feet were comfortably dry when I finished. I'd recommend them but strongly suggest you consider thinking about how they run a little large.
customer_reviews.author: keith t

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of timberlands. Once I broke them in they became very comfortable. They are not soft but not hard. I was surprised at the quality. I thought the brand was hype. Don't know how long they will last but I would buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Boult

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These Timberland boots are very warm and comfortable for getting around in winter conditions. Very sure footed in these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy and warm. They run somewhat large, so I'd recommend getting the same size as your regular shoes. The color is great too, they look fancy even though I use them for work.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: I would gladly buy these boots again.
customer_reviews.text: After adding some additional arch support, these are some of the best wearing boots I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: slimkennydee

customer_reviews.title: True to size!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was super hyped to own black timbs LOL So this purchase was amazing and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Zendrick

customer_reviews.title: I think it's just right for me
customer_reviews.text: This pair of boots suits me very well.Let me tell you something.I am a man who has no taste in clothes.But since wearing these boots.Everyone around me praised me for my good looks.It felt as if these shoes matched perfectly with all my clothes.I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Hanslik

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son for Christmas. He loves the boots and they had the Timberland tag which he also likes, and says he has to have on his Timberland. Thank you so much Robert Wayne Footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Debra  Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, THE TIMS RUN BIG SO MAKE SURE TO BUY A SIZE DOWN THEN YOUR NORMAL SNEAKER
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great, and fast delivery. I bought a pair and recently returned them to get a smaller size once I learned these tims run very big, I’m usually a size 12.5-13 US Men’s in normal sneakers. My first pair of Tim’s I ordered on here were a size 12 and felt giant on my foot so I took them back and ordered a size 11.5 US Mens that fit perfect. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bronte

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable yet new. Reviewers write better over time. I hope
customer_reviews.author: Dmytro

customer_reviews.title: IM Glad i order these cuz a buddy of mys hit ...
customer_reviews.text: Got My Tims Friday , IM Glad i order these cuz a buddy of mys hit me up Friday night and told me hes having a wedding Sunday 3 2017... and these the only Good Shoes i have , work out Perfect ,,, The Wedding was lit, Puerto Ricans Knw how to get down lol
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with these. Saw a pair I liked better and returned these
customer_reviews.author: megogo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Tims for my son and he absolutely loves them! They are a perfect fit and very stylish!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha St John Mosse

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Riding Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing! I use these boots for riding a sport bike, as I do not like traditional riding boots. These boots hold up well to bad weather and are very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: RomelM

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe from what I can tell. I wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoe from what I can tell. I wear boots every day for work, typically a size 12. Read that these are a bit bigger than expected, so I ordered a size down. Still too large. If you wear a 12 I would order an 11, possibly even 10.5.
customer_reviews.author: figgins

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure worn, box taped up, seems to be legit timberlands
customer_reviews.text: Product is legit, i do think they have been worn, but can't really tell, but for the price and expecting new was a shame to see they looked worn on the inside, probably just once. Box is beat to pieces and taped up, so will figure that part out for Christmas, shipment was incredibly fast.
customer_reviews.author: Sds86

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect timberlands just like we saw at many stores- but for a better price!
customer_reviews.author: Brainstorm

customer_reviews.title: Buy these boots
customer_reviews.text: Timberland always puts out quality pair of boots. I am very satisfied with my buy and I recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Theron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. The brand runs large but I knew to get a size smaller than my normal and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: pz

customer_reviews.title: looks and feel good but they are sized big
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, looks and feel good but they are sized big. All my other shoes are one size and fit, I used that size and it's way big. Otherwise it's a solid boot.
customer_reviews.author: David Vanbogelen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size based on previous reviews saying it fit a little loose, and I got exactly what I expected. Very durable in rough and rocky terrain, but of course it doesn't hold its beauty with all the scuffs and scrapes. I'll probably replace it with the same or similar product once it finally wears out.
customer_reviews.author: 982500h

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: the heal already broke.. there are a tiny little rod in the sole that already came apart not even 2 months of occasional use. very disappointed.. this one is a counterfeit its fake.. I can't believe that I kept it..
customer_reviews.author: kamal judeh

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, and fits as expected And they are comfortable Sizing: if you are a 10 on sneakers use 9 on timberlands; But if you want them a little loosy goosy go for 9 WIDE But 9 usa are fitted
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Lackyear

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Love the Boots. Eventho the color of the boot on the picture was darker (and in person they were lighter) they still was good. The box came alil ripped on the backside but all in all the boot was very comfortable and clean. No marks or wear on them.
customer_reviews.author: Damien A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are replacing a pair that lasted five years great boots great fit
customer_reviews.author: janice M Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Definitely was worth the price and also the color I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Torrin Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the product
customer_reviews.text: The fitment was ok. Very disappointed with the product. They have glue stains all over. I was not able to change them since they were a gift. TERRIBLE. So far the worst product i have received through Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Classic, won’t go out of style
customer_reviews.text: Real Authentic Timbs. Classic look and fit. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: but are still my favorite pair. They have a lot of "Character"
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Timberland Premium Boots for the last thirty years. I have eight pairs of various colors. I purchased the current pair to replace a similar pair of black nubuck Timberland boots I bought in 1990 ( if they EVER wear out ). The older boots have a few nicks and dings, but are still my favorite pair. They have a lot of "Character"! I clearly expect the pair I just bought to last the rest of my life. They are exceptionally well made, comfortable and stylish. I'm extremely happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: F. R. Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: These are just some great kicks. I love them and I try to not wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Os

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure these are knock offs and run VERY large ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure these are knock offs and run VERY large a 9 was like a 11. I did return and refund was granted, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gina Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: I wear an 11 in the wheat color Timberland boots ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 in the wheat color Timberland boots (10061), but these seemed a bit bigger on my foot. I could have possibly gone with a 10.5.
customer_reviews.author: agtindale

customer_reviews.title: Dark green color way is great!
customer_reviews.text: The dark green variant is great! I wear them during winter whenever I need to dress up a bit more than usual. It’s dark enough that it can pass as black at night!

customer_reviews.title: Blue Timberland boots
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my finance! Color is beautiful & comfortable as told by my fiancé! He loved them!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are actually the ones my fiancé loves. The others were the wrong kind and had to be returned.

product_meta.title: Timberland Men's 6-Inch Premium Waterproof Boot
product_meta.description:
Leather boot featuring padded collar, lace-up vamp, and logo detail at side heel. imported. rubber sole. shaft measures approximately 6.25 from arch. heel measures approximately 1.25 . platform measures approximately 75 boot opening measures approximately 14.5 around. 400 grams of primaloft insulation for superior warmth and comfort.

There's just no substitute for a sturdy, guaranteed waterproof boot to keep feet comfortable and dry, rain or shine. And Timberland has been making this one since they opened their doors more than thirty years ago. Rugged and dependable, they like to think of it as the role model for everything they make today.

Timberland set new industry standards for craftsmanship, durability and protection when it introduced an authentic, waterproof leather boot in 1973. A global leader in design, engineering and marketing of premium footwear, Timberland values consumers who cherish the outdoors and their time in it. Timberland has been an industry leader in the use of both sustainable and recycled materials in its shoes, as well as its footwear packaging. The Timberland Company believes in corporate responsibility and supports numerous civic and social projects throughout the year.

See more
feature_bullets: Classic STYLE: rain, slush, or snow, boots are Timberland specialty, and when you think of Timberland boots, you're thinking of these. Our original waterproof boot provides tireless waterproof performance and instantly recognizable work-boot styling

Look no further for trail-ready performance and style. Our selection of men’s hiking boots, waterproof hiking boots, casual boots, and casual shoes is designed to fit in with your outdoor-ready ensembles, whether you’re heading to the summit or downtown

Timberland boots are synonymous with quality workmanship. Whether you're looking for men's boots, women's Boots, or kids boots, Timberland has you covered. For the best in hiking boots, rain boots, work boots, casual shoes & Boots & More, choose Timberland

What you need in the outdoors: Timberland isn't just for high-quality Men's, women's, and kids boots. We have the gear you need for all your outdoor adventures, including jackets and coats for outdoor activities, backpacks and luggage & outdoor accessories

The best in outdoors: see how Timberland line of outdoor wear stacks up to hiking boots and outdoor gear from brands like Columbia, Merrell, vasque, oboz, hi tec, doc Martens, uggs, muck boots, keen, maelstrom, Justin, hunter, Bogs, nike, or sorel
